header.title: Conte um Conto (Small Storytelling)
header.subtitle: Voluntary work project to nurture kids creativity and writing capabilities.

text: Created from a partnership between ELLP Group and another voluntary group called Construindo Meu Castelo from the city of Castelo (Espírito Santo, Brazil), the project had the goal of developing portuguese readers and writers with a critical sense, empowering young students from low-income society to be a leading figure of their own lives.

From that goal, a web-based platform was developed to allow young students to write their own stories and get feedback from their teachers regarding their writing errors and evolution. At the end of their journey, students could get a final PDF version of their writings compiled into a digital book, graduating them as young writers.

As a co-founder, the work from the middle of 2017 to the beginning of 2018 was to gather requirements and ideas for the voluntary development team, convert the ideas into wireframes as well as establish partnerships with institutions to use this tool in their education systems.
Roles: Co-founder, designer UI/UX, full stack developer and manager.
Tech stack: Photoshop, Wireframes, Git, VueJS, NodeJS, SASS, Asana, Scrum.
